feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 50 km/h gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
